name: Sidebar Video
author: Mehedi Hasan Kanon

sections.description:
Sidebar Video plugin you can set video on your sidebar easily. You can show Youtube, Vimeo and uploaded video in your sidebar.

Display Sidebar Video

★★★★★

Click “Sidebar Video” on your deshbord.
★★★★★
“Enable” the checkbox.
★★★★★
After that fill the all field and nesary information that you want to show.

★★★★★

“Sidebar Video will go on my “essential plugins” list from now on. I am pleased by how easy it was to figure out and by how many options are available in the free version.” – mhkanon

Every part of Custom Sidebars integrates seamlessly with the Widgets menu for simplicity and control. No confusing settings pages or added menu items, just simple core integration.

A Simple Flexible Sidebar Video

** Sidebar Video Includes: **
* Show any Youtube Video
* Show any Vimeo Video
* Show any Uploaded Video
* Control video size
* You can set Title and Subtitle
* Control Title, Subtitle Font and color

Install Sidebar Video and make it the most popular widget extension plugin available for WordPress.org
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin. Upload the unzipped folder to the wp-contents/plugins folder of your WordPress installation.
  2. Active the plugin from the WordPress Plugins administration page.
  3. After installing you can see “Dashboard” a new menu “Sidebar Video”.
sections.faq:
How do I use the plugin?

Ans: First you have to install it. After installing you can see “Dashboard” a new menu “Sidebar Video”. Fill the all field and save it.
